00001 <?php
00002 /*
00003         log.php defines logVisitor() and logUser(), which log visitors and authors,
00004         trying to remember them. Visitors are identified by the first time seen.
00005         Included in common.php.
00006         Data saved:
00007                 ip inet,
00008                 logid int,
00009                 time int,
00010                 type varchar(31), // index/panel
00011                 what int  // file_id/panel_id

00013                 agent varchar(1023),
00014                 acclang varchar(1023),
00015                 request varchar(1023),
00016                 uid int,
00017                 details varchar(1023)
00018 */

00022 function logUser($type, $what=-1)
00023 {
00024         global $DB, $USER;
00025         $DB->log[] = array(
00026                 'uid' => $USER['uid'],
00027                 'ip' => $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'],
00028                 'time' => time(),
00029                 'type' => $type,
00030                 'what' => intval($what)
00031         );
00032 }
00033 
00034 function actionShowLog()
00035 {
00036         global $DB, $USER;
00037         if (!userCan('showLog'))  return;
00038 
00039         $authors = array();
00040         $res = $DB->query('SELECT uid,name,login FROM table_users');
00041         foreach ($res as $row)
00042                 $authors[$row['uid']] = $row;
00043 
00044         $res = $DB->query('SELECT ip,uid,time,type,what FROM table_log ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 50');
00045         $rows = '';
00046         foreach ($res as $row)
00047         {
00048                 if (array_key_exists($row['uid'], $authors))
00049                         $author = $authors[$row['uid']];
00050                 else
00051                         $author = array('name'=>'', 'login'=>'?');
00052                 $rows .= '<tr>';
00053                 $rows .= '<td>'.strftime('%y-%m-%d %H:%M',$row['time']).'</td>';
00054                 $rows .= '<td>'.$author['name'].' ('.$author['login'].')</td>';
00055                 $rows .= '<td>'.$row['type'].'</td>';
00056                 $rows .= '<td>'.$row['what'].'</td>';
00057                 if (DEBUG)  $rows .= '<td>'. $row['ip'] .'</td>';
00058                 $rows .= '</tr>';
00059         }
00060 
00061         global $PAGE;
00062         $PAGE->title = 'Log';
00063         $template = new SimpleTemplate(array('rows' => $rows));
00064         ?>
00065                 <div class="contentBox panel userLog">
00066                 <table>
00067                         <thead><tr><th>{{when}}</th><th>{{who}}</th><th>{{what}}</th><th>{{which}}</th></tr></thead>
00068                         %rows%
00069                 </table>
00070                 </div>
00071         <?php
00072         echo $template->finish(true);
00073 }

00075 // DEPRECATED - I didn't use that since I don't know when...
00076 function logVisitor($type, $what, $details='')
00077 {
00078         return;
00079 
00080         global $USER;
00081         if (isset($USER['uid']))  $uid = intval($USER['uid']);
00082         else $uid = -1;
00083         $time = time();
00084         if (!isset($_SESSION['logid']))  $_SESSION['logid'] = $time;
00085 
00086         // Fill the data to remember into $params, to pass it safely through pg_query_params.
00087         $params = array();
00088         foreach (array('REMOTE_ADDR','HTTP_REFERER','HTTP_USER_AGENT','HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE','REQUEST_URI') as $var)
00089         {
00090                 if (isset($_SERVER[$var])) $params[]= $_SERVER[$var];
00091                 else $params[]= null;
00092         }
00093         $params[]= $details;
00094 
00095         // INSERT
00096 }
